Description: Nile silt pottery vase, exterior coated with red slip with black top and burnished; flat base, high convex sides and wide mouth with out-turning rim. Interior untreated.
Curator's comments: Marked B112 on side. Like Black top red ware B33p in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery (1921).
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 17 Jan 2003. Internal loan, Oriental Antiquities, Addis Gallery.
